title: Pillars of Eternity has one of the single most retarded endings in the history of gaming.
body:
https://tse2.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.Me6ebc77a22f197bc127374f519140806o0&pid=15.1

Obv spoilers ahoy, from someone trying to explain it to me.


The major plot twist was that there were no deities. Yet you are conversing with the non-existent gods. They even give you a very real stat boost.
The woman who revealed to you that there are no gods is soulbound by the gods and you convince her to prove the non-existence of the gods by destroying her soul, which she admits is held by the gods.
Your whole quest is to stop a madmen from giving power back to a god, and before stopping him you almost make him admit that the god he wants to empower doesn't exist. Then you have the option to empower the god that doesn't exist yourself, only to find out that the non-existing god exists, but it doesn't because that was the point of the story.

What the fuck does this mean.

I don't know what the writers were on, but that is some of the dumbest shit man can conceive and somehow call it a story.
